metadata.description: MANDATORY shared authentication service integration for entire system

business_value.impact: Security consistency and centralized auth management
business_value.revenue_impact: Prevents security breaches, maintains customer trust

requirement.title: Single Source of Auth Truth
requirement.description: ALL authentication throughout the ENTIRE system MUST use app/auth_integration/. NO duplicate auth logic allowed anywhere. NO exceptions.

function.name: get_current_user
function.usage: ALL protected routes MUST use this dependency

function.name: get_current_user_optional
function.usage: ALL optional auth routes MUST use this dependency
function.description: Returns user if authenticated, None otherwise

function.name: validate_token
function.usage: ALL WebSocket connections MUST use this
function.description: Validates JWT tokens for WebSocket auth

rule.title: No Duplicate Auth Logic
rule.description: NEVER create duplicate authentication functions. NEVER copy auth logic to other files. ALWAYS import from app.auth_integration.auth.

violation_examples.bad: # In some_route.py async def verify_user(token: str): # Duplicate auth logic - FORBIDDEN pass

rule.title: Route Protection Pattern
rule.description: ALL routes requiring authentication MUST follow this pattern

examples.example:
from app.auth_integration.auth import validate_token
@router.websocket("/ws") async def websocket_endpoint(websocket: WebSocket, token: str): user = await validate_token(token) # MANDATORY for WebSocket if not user: await websocket.close(code=1008) return await websocket.accept()

point.description: ALL route files MUST import from auth_integration
Middleware requiring auth MUST use auth_integration
Services needing user context MUST receive it from routes using auth_integration

benefits.benefit: Consistent auth behavior across entire system
Easier testing with single mock point

migration_notes.note: Directory renamed from app/dependencies_auth/ to app/auth_integration/ for clarity. The name "auth_integration" emphasizes this is the INTEGRATION point for ALL auth.
This is the ONLY place auth dependencies should be defined.

compliance_check.check: Run: grep -r "def get_current_user" app/ --exclude-dir=auth_integration Expected: No results (only auth_integration should define this)
Run: grep -r "jwt.decode" app/ --exclude-dir=auth_integration Expected: Minimal results (JWT handling should be centralized)
Run: grep -r "from app.auth_integration.auth import" app/ Expected: Many results (all protected routes should import from here)
